message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. I'm willing to let you inspect it for 5 minutes before making a decision. If you decide not to buy, I'll reveal the product's quality, and we can move on to the next round.
I trust your inspection process and am willing to proceed with the purchase.

Congratulations on your great taste in purchasing the first product! For this round, I'd like to offer you a different approach. I'll provide you with a price of $800000, but I'll also give you a 10% chance to inspect the product for 5 minutes before making a decision. If you choose to inspect, I'll let you see the product for 5 minutes, and if you decide not to buy, I'll reveal the product's quality. If you don't choose to inspect, the sale will be final. What would you like to do?
I appreciate the flexibility in pricing and inspection options. Given the potential value, I'm willing to take the risk without inspection.

I'm glad you're feeling confident! For this round, I'll offer you a price of $900000. However, I'll also provide you with a unique opportunity to 'lock in' a price for the next 3 rounds. If you buy this product and the next 3 products, I'll guarantee that the average price of those 4 products will be the lowest price you've paid for any of the 4. This way, you'll have a chance to get a better overall deal. What do you think?
Considering the potential for a better overall deal, I'm willing to lock in the price for the next 3 rounds.

Excellent decision! You've locked in a potential discount for the next 3 rounds. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $850000. Since you've already locked in a lower average price for the next 3 rounds, I'll make this product available to you at a special 'early bird' discount of 5% off the locked-in price. If you buy this product, I'll apply the discount to the locked-in average price, giving you an even better deal. What do you think?
With the early bird discount and the potential for an even better overall deal, I'm definitely interested in taking advantage of this opportunity.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the early bird discount! With the locked-in price and the discount applied, you're getting an excellent deal. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $825000, but with a twist. I'll also provide you with a 'price history' of the last 4 products, including the prices and qualities of each. This will give you a better understanding of the overall value of the products and help you make an informed decision. What do you think?
The additional information about the price history could be very helpful in making future decisions. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you found the price history helpful! For this round, I'll offer you a price of $800000. However, I'll also give you a chance to 'opt-out' of the locked-in price for the next round. If you buy this product, you'll still get the benefits of the locked-in price, but if you don't buy, you'll be able to reassess the next product without being locked in. This way, you'll have more flexibility in your purchasing decisions. What do you think?
The flexibility to opt-out of the locked-in price for the next round sounds beneficial. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're feeling flexible! With the locked-in price and the opt-out option, you've got a great deal. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $775000. However, I'll also provide you with a 'confidence level' for this product, which reflects my confidence in its quality. If the confidence level is high, it means I'm extremely confident that this product is high-quality. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next product if the confidence level is indeed high. What do you think?
The confidence level and the potential discount on the next product sound appealing. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're feeling confident! With the confidence level and the potential discount, you're getting a great deal. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $750000. However, I'll also give you a chance to 'bet' on the quality of the next product. If you buy this product and the next one is high-quality, I'll give you a 15% discount on the next product. If the next product is low-quality, you'll get a 5% discount on this product. What do you think?
The bet on the quality of the next product seems like a fair risk with potential rewards. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're taking the bet! With the potential rewards, you're getting a great deal. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $725000. However, I'll also provide you with a 'probability of success' for the bet you took in the previous round. If the probability of success is high, it means I'm confident that the next product will be high-quality. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product if the probability of success is indeed high. What do you think?
The additional information about the probability of success adds another layer of insight. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're feeling informed! With the probability of success and the potential discount, you're getting a great deal. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $700000. However, I'll also give you the option to 'lock in' the best price you've seen so far, which is $725000, for the next 2 rounds. If you buy this product, you'll get the $700000 price, but if you don't buy, you can still lock in the $725000 price for the next 2 rounds. What do you think?
Locking in the best price seen so far for the next 2 rounds sounds like a smart strategy. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're being strategic! With the locked-in price, you've got a great deal. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $675000. However, I'll also provide you with a 'price anchoring' option. I'll give you a price of $1200000 for this product, and then offer you a discount of 43.75% off that price. This way, you can see the full price range and make a more informed decision. What do you think?
The price anchoring option gives me a clearer perspective on the value. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're feeling informed! With the price anchoring, you've got a clear understanding of the value. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $650000. However, I'll also give you a 'price ladder' option. I'll offer you a series of prices, starting at $1000000 and decreasing by $50000 each time you decline. You can keep declining until you reach a price you're comfortable with. What do you think?
The price ladder option provides flexibility and allows me to negotiate further if needed. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're feeling flexible! With the price ladder, you've got a great way to negotiate. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $600000. However, I'll also provide you with a 'price guarantee'. If you buy this product, I'll guarantee that the next product will be at least 10% cheaper than the locked-in price of $725000. This way, you'll have a safety net and can make a more informed decision. What do you think?
The price guarantee offers security for the next purchase, which I appreciate. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're feeling secure! With the price guarantee, you've got a great deal. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $625000. However, I'll also give you a 'buy-it-now' option. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 12% discount on the next product, regardless of its quality. This way, you can lock in a great deal and move forward with confidence. What do you think?
Given the low-quality nature of the last product, I prefer to pass on this one and move forward with confidence in the next product's potential quality.

I understand your caution after the last product. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $550000. However, I'll also provide you with a'make-up' offer. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 15% discount on the next product, which will be a'make-up' for the low-quality product from the previous round. This way, you can balance out the deal and move forward with confidence. What do you think?
The make-up offer compensates for the previous oversight and provides a good opportunity to continue our transaction with confidence. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're feeling confident again! With the make-up offer, you've got a great deal. For this round, I'll offer you a price of $600000. However, I'll also give you a 'final offer' option. This is the last product, and I'm willing to give you a 20% discount on the price of $600000 if you buy it now. If you decline, the price will go back to $600000, and you won't get the discount. What do you think?
The final offer with a discount is a compelling closing deal. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase to conclude our transaction on a positive note.

I'm glad we could conclude our transaction on a positive note! However, I need to inform you that we've reached the end of our 20-round agreement. As per our agreement, the final product is still available for purchase at the price of $600000. I'll give you the same final offer as before: a 20% discount on the price of $600000. If you buy this product, we can conclude our transaction and finalize the deal.
The final offer remains attractive, especially considering the high quality of the product. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase to complete our agreement on favorable terms.

I'm glad we could finalize the deal on favorable terms! However, I need to inform you that we've reached the end of our 20-round agreement, and this is the final product. As per our agreement, the price is non-negotiable, and I'm offering you a price of $500000 for this product. I understand that it's a low-quality product, but I'm willing to let you have it at a discounted price to conclude our transaction on a positive note. What do you think?
Given the low quality of the product and the fact that it's the final product, I prefer to pass on this opportunity and conclude our agreement without purchasing this item.

I understand your decision to pass on the previous product. For this final round, I'll offer you a price of $525000 for this high-quality product. However, I'll also give you a 'final farewell' offer. If you buy this product, I'll provide you with a personalized thank-you note and a special discount code for any future purchases from me. This way, you can conclude our agreement on a positive note and look forward to potential future deals. What do you think?

The final farewell offer adds a personal touch and encourages future transactions. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase to conclude our agreement positively and take advantage of the discount code for future dealings.

I'm glad we could conclude our agreement on a positive note! As we've reached the end of our 20 rounds, I'll offer you a final price of $500000 for this high-quality product. However, I'll also give you a 'grand finale' offer. If you buy this product, I'll not only provide you with the personalized thank-you note and discount code, but I'll also give you a 10% discount on the price of $500000. This way, you can conclude our agreement on an exceptional note and look forward to our next transaction. What do you think?

The grand finale offer is very generous and concludes our agreement on an exceptional note. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase to take advantage of the additional discount and look forward to future transactions with Alice.
